mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rehugi (hnum, unum, rhcontent, rhwriteday) VALUES (#{hnum}, #{unum}, #{rhcontent}, now())
INSERT INTO rehugi (hnum, unum, rhcontent, rhwriteday, ref, step, depth) VALUES (#{hnum}, #{unum}, #{rhcontent}, now(), #{ref}, #{step}, #{depth})
mapper.select: SELECT c.*, r.unickname, r.uname, r.hnum, r.hcontent, r.hphoto, r.hwriteday, r.hlike FROM rehugi c JOIN rehugi r ON c.hnum = r.hnum AND c.unum = r.unum WHERE c.hnum = #{hnum} ORDER BY c.rhwriteday ASC
SELECT * FROM rehugi WHERE hnum = #{hnum} ORDER BY ref ASC, step ASC
